None.Name: Gimme Power!
None.Description: Activate to immediately transfer 30% of own and friendly player's current void power back into the acutal power pool. There will be no power refund at all for 40 seconds afterwards. Has a 60 seconds cool-down after the building was built. Reusable every 60 seconds.
